The authors thank Nuri Unal, Ganim Gecim and Semra Gurtas for useful discussions.
A.G. performed the calculation procedure. Y.S. and R.S. suggested the problem and discussed the physics behind
the interaction mechanism. A.G. and R.S. analyzed the results. All authors equally contributed to preparation of
